channel.title: ~~~[508]Bryanscape[508]~~~ REALEASE
channel.description:
[size=36pt]~~~508Bryanscape RELEASE Bryanscape508 ~~~[/size]
Today is the day that I release my source. This is my first source so don't flame this. I knew that day would come when people would want my source, So i thought id give out it out today. It was made on August 13th, 2008. I worked very hard on this source but I wanted to go make a 562 called Robin-x. The client release is on August 12th, 2010. PLease feel free to join. This server was worked on a lot with my friend Kieran, thanks Kieran. I have made some errors to make sure leechers don't use my source for them. I have made a .bat error Server can not find main file, This is really easy to fix. Also I have made a 5 void errors (really simple). [center]Features[/center] 100% d claws special. All 23 skills do work. There is only one glitch that needs to be fixed in fishing. (Goes on top of water to fish) Added new pvp areas. 100% gs specials for all gs. Many pk areas Custom Yells (the yell taggs are the same) Working clanchat Private messages work 100% Donater shop 12 shops I think. Many moderator, administrator, and owner commands. (I didn't make Donater commands you can do that) Working duel arena. Working clan wars only 1 glitch (takes 50 secounds when you die to spawn back) Ive added Castle wars and I made it where when you die you can only spawn one time, so if you died you won't be able to join the game until a new game is made. New home I didn't add adminzone modzone or ownerzone because last time I added it, some won knew how to get it in without being a admin mod or owner. 100% working godwars (easy) All Npc follow you when attacking. Kbd kbd drops rare items (dfs, d clawz , d legs , d mask , d plate body) You have to make the dfs by crafting it I added a ::reset (username) command, this is only for the Real main owner. Wich means if you 2 main owners, the real owner is the person hosting the server. ::ban, ipban, mute, unmute, ipmute, jail, and unjail do work. ::ban and mute Only for admins ::mute and unmute only for mods ::ban, unban, mute, ipmute, unmute, jail and unjail only for owners ::msgall privte message every body. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~Credits~ Palindo76 His source 10% Me 50% i programmed alot of it Kieran 20% for helping me Luc 10% also there to help JUstin 10% also for helping me ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~please if you download or comment please leave a NICE comment. If your going to just talk shit about it, then get the fuck out. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You can use any client! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ source down link~ http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Z456JIGC
Happy coding, c4r t0yzzz
PICS ARE COMING SOON!

Guys, it doesint run because some files are removed because of leechers. All you need to do, is add .java files and repair the .bat evrything else is fine. Yes it has anti-leech because of leechers…I want people to use this source… to actually progeram it…not just remove stuff and changing names…actually get in to coding it… What i think leechein g is
add npcs changing the name to thier desired name. add and remove shops change home and more…
thats leeching…

item.title: ~~~[508]Bryanscape[508]~~~ REALEASE
item.dc:creator: @c4r_t0yzzz c4r t0yzzz
item.description:
@c4r_t0yzzz wrote:

                                 [size=36pt]~~~508Bryanscape RELEASE Bryanscape508 ~~~[/size]

Today is the day that I release my source. This is my first source so don’t flame this. I knew that day would come when people would want my source, So i thought id give out it out today. It was made on August 13th, 2008. I worked very hard on this source but I wanted to go make a 562 called Robin-x. The client release is on August 12th, 2010. PLease feel free to join. This server was worked on a lot with my friend Kieran, thanks Kieran. I have made some errors to make sure leechers don’t use my source for them. I have made a .bat error Server can not find main file, This is really easy to fix. Also I have made a 5 void errors (really simple).
[center]Features[/center]
100% d claws special.
All 23 skills do work. There is only one glitch that needs to be fixed in fishing. (Goes on top of water to fish)
Added new pvp areas.
100% gs specials for all gs.
Many pk areas
Custom Yells (the yell taggs are the same)
Working clanchat
Private messages work 100%
Donater shop
12 shops I think.
Many moderator, administrator, and owner commands. (I didn’t make Donater commands you can do that)
Working duel arena.
Working clan wars only 1 glitch (takes 50 secounds when you die to spawn back)
Ive added Castle wars and I made it where when you die you can only spawn one time, so if you died you won’t be able to join the game until a new game is made.
New home
I didn’t add adminzone modzone or ownerzone because last time I added it, some won knew how to get it in without being a admin mod or owner.
100% working godwars (easy)
All Npc follow you when attacking.
Kbd
kbd drops rare items (dfs, d clawz , d legs , d mask , d plate body)
You have to make the dfs by crafting it
I added a ::reset (username) command, this is only for the Real main owner. Wich means if you 2 main owners, the real owner is the person hosting the server.
::ban, ipban, mute, unmute, ipmute, jail, and unjail do work.
::ban and mute Only for admins
::mute and unmute only for mods
::ban, unban, mute, ipmute, unmute, jail and unjail only for owners
::msgall privte message every body.

~Credits~
Palindo76 His source 10%
Me 50% i programmed alot of it
Kieran 20% for helping me
Luc 10% also there to help
JUstin 10% also for helping me
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~please if you download or comment please leave a NICE comment.
If your going to just talk shit about it, then get the fuck out.

You can use any client!

source down link~ http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Z456JIGC

Happy coding,
c4r t0yzzz
